cast.name: 马克·查尔斯·考林 Mark Charles Cowling

introduction: The Apprentice: ONE Championship Edition is a reality television program that premiered in Asia on 18 March 2021 and will air worldwide from June 2021. Unlike The Apprentice Asia, it is a new global edition co-owned by MGM and ONE Championship.The show features 16 candidates from around the world competing in both business and physical challenges. The winner will receive a US$250,000 job offer to work directly under ONE Chairman and CEO Chatri Sityodtong for a year as his protégé (and as a member of Chief of Staff) in Singapore. CEOs from major companies and prominent mixed martial artists will also guest star on the show.
